name: Battle City (Rule Card)
text:
RULES:
? Starting LP is 4000.
? First turn draws 1 card.
? Monsters can be Normal Summoned in face-up Defense Position.
? Level 10+ monsters require 3 Tributes to be Normal Summoned.
? Ignition Effects of the turn player's monsters can be activated on Summon.
? When an Extra Deck monster is Tributed, that monster can be counted as a number of monsters equal to the number of materials that were used for its Special Summon.
? Extra Deck monsters cannot attack the turn they are Summoned.
? DIVINE monsters cannot attack the turn they are Special Summoned from the GY.
? Set Spells can be activated like Trap Cards.
? Spells can be used like Quick-Play Spells during the Battle Phase.
? If an activated Spell/Trap is destroyed, it is negated.
? If the attack target leaves the field, the attack is negated.
? When your opponent targets 1 monster you control for an attack or card effect and you Summon a monster(s): You can change the target to 1 of the Summoned monster(s).
